tileset = "catacombs";
area = "crypt5";
areaname = "Catacombs - Social Fox\'s Tomb";
ambience = null;
dungeon = "Catacombs";
A_sprites = [{name:"UP",model:"BIGDOOR3",x:11,y:70,dest:["crypt4",7,1],dir:"s"}];
if(!GameData.plotVars.ZDRAGON)
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Zombie Dragon",model:"dragon",x:11,y:6,walkspeed:-1,dir:"n",Static:1,elem:"DARK",conv:[Do = function()
   {
      _root.playSFX("dragon_roar");
      return 1;
   },["angr","Rrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr!!!!"],Do = function()
   {
      GameData.plotVars.ZDRAGON = 1;
      BATTLE([["ZombieDragon",null,null,null],["Zombie Dragon",null,null,null],[18,null,null,null],"DRAGON"],"BossBattle",true);
      return true;
   }]});
}
areaLoot = [{x:22,y:47,amount:1,item:"Mind Crystal",hidden:true},{x:1,y:61,amount:3140,type:"gold",hidden:true},{x:11,y:37,amount:5,item:"BetterPotion"},{x:16,y:29,amount:4,item:"MugwortJuice",hidden:true}];
foes = MONSTER_TABLES.SFCRYPT;
btlChance = 5;
minSteps = 5;
levelrange = MONSTER_LEVELS.SFCRYPT;
musicTrack = "Catacombs";
AreaSetup({WARP:1});
